resources.string: Are you old enough to play this game?:
You did great job, Lean more by taking another quiz
User Name must contain an uppercase letter
User Name must contain an lowercase letter

Welcome to Trivia Quiz Game! Here is how to play: 
1. Enter your username and click Play button. 
2. Choose a category for your quiz. 
3. You will be presented with a series of questions. Click on the option that you think is correct. 
4. Your score will be updated as you answer each question. 
5. At the end of the quiz, your total score will be displayed. 
6. You can view the leaderboard by clicking on Rank button. 
Enjoy the game!
